{{disambig-more: '''Strider''' was a pony acquired by [[Frodo Baggins]] in [[Minas Tirith]]. He named it "[[Strider]]" after [[Aragorn]]'s own nickname from [[Eriador]].
Strider rode with Frodo back to [[the Shire]] at the end of the [[War of the Ring]].<ref>{{RK
Strider: VI6}}</ref> Two years later he carried him westwards in the [[Last Riding of the Keepers]] to the [[Grey Havens]] on the coast of the [[Belegaer
